Update State Variables for trivial (L Component)

Source: R/aquatic-L-trivial.R
Update_Lt.trivial.Rd

Implements Update_Lt for the trivial (forced emergence) model.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'trivial'
Update_Lt(t, y, xds_obj, s)

Arguments

t

current simulation time

y

state vector

xds_obj

an xds model object

s

the species index

Value

a numeric vector
